name: Focus On Your Work
description: Block distracting sites during work by redirecting them to a focus page. Toggle via the toolbar icon. Configurable URL patterns with wildcards or regex.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self'; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; child-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com;
